name: Compact Style for BX.in.th
description: A stylesheet for BX.in.th cryptocurrency exchange to make it more compact and easier to notice important values
additional_info:
Version 0.4.1
  • Fix gap between alerts and panels
Version 0.4.0
  • Display charts in one row, order boxes in another row.
  • Always show My Open Orders side-by-side with switchable buy/sell form
  • Compact orders list and order forms
Version 0.3.0
  • Display Price Chart and Market Depth Chart side-by-side
  • Fixed issues on Google Chrome browser
Version 0.2.1
  • Fixed issues when resizing screen
Version 0.2.0
  • Larger charts panel, smaller order box panel
  • No inner scroll on trade tables
Version 0.1.0
  • Hide site header
  • Larger latest, high, low prices
  • Larger latest trade row, max buy order, min sell order
  • Smaller gaps and borders
  • Smaller box headers
